name: github-profile-analytics
description: Comprehensive GitHub profile analytics and enhancement platform

scripts.build: npm run client:build && npm run server:build
scripts.test: npm run client:test && npm run server:test
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run client:lint && npm run server:lint
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules client/dist server/dist

author: GitHub Analytics Team
